Text:
thank you so much eztv!

Have my babies!!!


no seriously take them, they're getting annoying.
Lots of pixelation and decoding errors in video, is this normal ? I'm using CoreAVC 1.95 (March 2009).

Sry, seems that pixelation disappeared after a restart... nVidia cards/drivers sure produce the weirdest of anomalies... no audio over HDMI, 256-colour HDMI output, black screens of death, multidisplay anomalies, and now this...

Blind if you have no audio over HDMI, be sure that you have connected you Graphics card to your soundcard with the supplied small wire.

 Personally I dont know why you would choose to use HDMI, its the same as DVI, and most displays have a DVI slot.

 Ive been using Nvidia for a few years now, and providing you are careful about which drivers to download, there should not be a problem.
